name: Wordpo
description:
Do you like word games?

Well sharpen your mind and vocabulary daily with Wordpo.

A new twist on the word game classics.

Compete against the computer to create words.
Challenge yourself and maximize your score.
Get new Wordpo games daily.
30k wordlist filled with both common and uncommon words.

- Attempt each Wordpo game as many times as you like.
- Drag tiles onto the board to build words from 2 - 6 letters in length.
- Every tile has its point value in top right corner.
- Longer words give bonus points, +1 for every letter over 2.

Expand your vocabulary with a few minutes a day with Wordpo.

Hope you will enjoy playing this game!

If you would like more daily games, download the game on the Google Play Store.

Wordpo - Apps on Google Play
